title: Ticket #4201: Shadow tries to restore checkpoint from 0.0.0.0, can't
description:
"lnmaurer" has several hundred standard universe jobs on submit-3.chtc.wisc.edu, about 100 on which are having problems restoring their checkpoints, so the large number of short executions in our report is a system problem, not a problem with her jobs:

From the ShadowLog:
